dict.string:
SWIFT_LINT="${PODS_ROOT}/SwiftLint/swiftlint" SWIFT_LINT_CONFIG="${SRCROOT}/swiftlint/.swiftlint.yml"
if test -f "${SWIFT_LINT}"; then if test -f "${SWIFT_LINT_CONFIG}"; then "${SWIFT_LINT}" autocorrect --config "${SWIFT_LINT_CONFIG}" else echo "warning: Swiflint configuration file missing make your the submodule is fetched üò≠üò©ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è" fi else echo "warning: SwiftLint not installed, download from https://github.com/realm/SwiftLint üò≠üò©ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è" fi
